name: Shield and Shoot!
description:
Swap between Attack and Defence in this thrilling shooter that's FILLED with delicious programmer art! You can’t use both simultaneously so use the modes and their respective abilities wisely and hope you survive the onslaught. Because your enemies know you’re here...

Some are big and beefy, others have lethal rocket launchers. Even the map itself has hazardous areas that will kill you! Pray that you can find some health packs because you’re gonna need it!

This was made by myself in four weeks as a student project at Game Programmer, Yrgo. Gothenburg, Sweden. Still learning the ropes of coding so if you encounter any bugs or such, let me know and I'll see if I can hammer those out. :]

/Johan Appelgren
